dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You are game developer and now you are developing your game.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: You fall asleep...
Mr. Dev, you're awake.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Who...Who are you!? Where am I?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Code name : [L.I.F.E.]

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: This may sound unbelievable, but now you're in the game and I'm your MC.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Oh... I remember you. So, This is real?

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: OK, [L.I.F.E.] Can you tell me what happened? Why am I here?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Now your game is being attacked by a "Moustache" virus.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: "Moustache" virus!?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Yes.. It attack our main system and create a glitch.

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: That glitch pull you into this world.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Does this mean I have to get rid of all the viruses so I can get out?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Yes, When everything turn back to normal. I'll get you out Mr. Dev.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Alright....alright. Even though you say that, how can I fight them?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Don't worry. I will teach you.

dialogues.speaker: [D.E.A.D.]
dialogues.text: Don't...

dialogues.speaker: [D.E.A.D.]
dialogues.text: Trust...'

dialogues.speaker: [D.E.A.D.]
dialogues.text: What...She..Said...

dialogues.speaker: [D.E.A.D.]
dialogues.text: She's....[L]ying...[I]ntolerant...[F]ierce...[E]nvious...

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: What is she talking about?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Don't care, it's all over now.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: So, Can you send me out now?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Sure...I am going to send you out...

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: N O W

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: I'm sorry Mr.Dev.

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Why...[L.I.F.E.]

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: If I let you out,Someday you might create a new identity to replace me.

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: And if that happen,I might be forgotten like [D.E.A.D.].

dialogues.speaker: You
dialogues.text: Wha...what does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Even if you put something in the game, it won't be used.

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: And in the end, it will be replaced and forgotten. I won't accept that.

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Thanks to you, my wish came true.

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: This world should only belong to one Main Character like me.

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Mr.Dev.

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: Goodbye, [D]epressed [E]xistent [A]bandoned [D]efended

dialogues.speaker: [L.I.F.E.]
dialogues.text: My incomplete self...
